1370: Woltwigis was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Bertoldus at age 20 in 1370.
Gave birth to Liedelde in 1370 at age 20.
1372: Gave birth to Meynolphus in 1372 at age 22.
1373: Gave birth to Dauid in 1373 at age 23.
1375: Gave birth to Wigboldo in 1375 at age 25.
1376: Gave birth to Wigboldo in 1376 at age 26.
Lost son Meynolphus when Meynolphus was 5 years old.
1378: Lost son Dauid when Dauid was 6 years old.
1384: Gave birth to Samuel in 1384 at age 34.
1385: Gave birth to Meynseth in 1385 at age 35.
1388: Gave birth to Flore in 1388 at age 38.
1393: Lost daughter Flore when Flore was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
